Posts.Content: Bonnie, My father has extensive small cell lung cancer and has consulted with a nutritionist as well as just finishing up his standard chemotherapy treatment. He is doing very well right now, but I'm nervous about the cancer spreading rapidly now that chemo is done. I'd love to compare notes on the nutritional supplements etc... Dawn
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?
